page.title: 19ELECTRONICS FACTORY
page.content: {G.& O.Robertson}have worked in the{ {electronics business}in Sanday for over 17 years. They work 5 days a week & 8 hours a day, but their hours really depend on how much they have to do. They make{training equipment}to train{radio operators,}which is used all over the world. They get their{raw {materials}&{components}like resistors & circuits, sent up from the south. Examples of the tools they use are soldering irons, special testing equipment, oscilloscopes, signal generators, frequency meters, etc. They have also supplied equipment to the{Hydro-Electric Board}& installed a{sound distribution system}in the Kirkwall Grammar School. They don't sell much to Sanday folk, except{CB {sets & aerials,}but they{repair} binoculars, radios, tape recorders, washing machines, fridges, etc.
